content:
StylusDownEventHandler Delegate

In this Article

Represents the method that handles the stem.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusDown event, as well as several variations, including the corresponding Preview event. Also re-exposes the event in the base element classes.

Syntax

Declaration

public delegate void StylusDownEventHandler(object sender, StylusDownEventArgs e);

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Delegate
  • StylusDownEventHandler

Remarks

Typically, this delegate corresponds to a routed event. Check the event data, in particular the Source property, to determine which element raised the event.
